thread.title: Billie Faiers looks amazing just a week after giving birth to her second child
thread.title_full: Billie Faiers looks amazing just a week after giving birth to her second child

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Billie Faiers looks amazing just a week after giving birth to her second child
text:
Billie Faiers looks amazing just a week after giving birth to her second child The TOWIE star welcomed a son last week but is already out and about Share Billie Faiers looked incredible one week after giving birth (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Billie Faiers gave birth to a baby boy just over a week ago - and she looks amazing. 
The reality star welcomed a son with fiance Greg Shepherd last week , joining three year old daughter Nelly in their family. 
Billie stepped out to run errands on Friday, looking great in jeans and a black top, and not at all like a woman who'd given birth a week ago. 
The previous day, the family enjoyed an outing on to a farm with Nelly and the new arrival, with fans astounded by how good she looked. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Billie Faiers posts funny vid of her daughter and fiance Share this video Billie looked great just one week after giving birth (Photo: FameFlynet) Despite having a week-old child, Billie looked amazing (Photo: FameFlynet) Billie and her fiance Greg (Photo: Billiefaiers/instagram) 
"Days after having a baby and 1 - she's out already and 2 - looks like this! Why can't we be like this," commented one follower, while another added, "2 months on and I can't look like that. I was still in hospital at this point lol". 
Most of the comments shared a similar sentiment, with one asking, "How the hell are you like 8st when you've just had a baby" and another adding, "She had a baby 2 minutes ago and she's tiny!" Billie's fiance Greg and daughter Nelly larking around (Photo: Instagram/billiefaiersofficial) Read More Sam Faiers shares sweet picture of Nelly meeting baby brother after sister Billie welcomes second child 
Earlier this month, Billie thanked fans for their kind messages following the birth, taking time to give a shout out to her loved ones on social media. 
Alongside a collage of flowers, she wrote: "Would just like you say a huge thank you to everyone for your kind messages 
"I appreciate it very much and of course to all my wonderful family and friends I have been showered with beautiful flowers, gifts and cards... my mumma @suziewells123 best flower arranger in town.. lots of love xxx (sic)" Like us on Facebook
